ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No one can ward it off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is none who could avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and no one will be able to prevent it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There is none that can avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There shall be none to avert it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: there is none to avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is none that can ward it off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: there is no one who could avert it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Of it there is no averter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is none who can avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There is none can avert it;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There is none that can avert it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: there is none to prevent it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There is nothing to avert it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Of it there is no preventer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:8] there is none that can avert it, from such [a deserving one].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There is none that can ward it off) there is none that can prevent this torment.
